text: Christopher or Chris Gaffney may refer to: * Chris Gaffney (writer, public speaker) (born 1980), writes at uncommondiscourse.com *Christopher Gaffney (bishop) (died 1576), Irish bishop * Chris Gaffney (musician) (1950–2008), American singer–songwriter * Christopher Gaffney (archaeologist) (born 1962), British archaeologist
title: Christopher Gaffney
